27#ifndef HB_OT_HDMX_TABLE_HH
28#define HB_OT_HDMX_TABLE_HH
29
30#include "hb-open-type.hh"
31
32/*
33 * hdmx -- Horizontal Device Metrics
34 * https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/hdmx
35 */
36#define HB_OT_TAG_hdmx HB_TAG('h','d','m','x')
37
38
39namespace OT {
40
41
42struct DeviceRecord
43{
44 static unsigned int get_size (unsigned count)
45 { return hb_ceil_to_4 (v: min_size + count * HBUINT8::static_size); }
46
47 template<typename Iterator,
48 hb_requires (hb_is_iterator (Iterator))>
49 bool serialize (hb_serialize_context_t *c, unsigned pixelSize, Iterator it)
50 {
51 TRACE_SERIALIZE (this);
52
53 unsigned length = it.len ();
54
55 if (unlikely (!c->extend (this, length))) return_trace (false);
56
57 this->pixelSize = pixelSize;
58 this->maxWidth =
59 + it
60 | hb_reduce (hb_max, 0u);
61
62 + it
63 | hb_sink (widthsZ.as_array (len: length));
64
65 return_trace (true);
66 }
67
68 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c, unsigned sizeDeviceRecord) const
69 {
70 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
71 return_trace (likely (c->check_struct (this) &&
72 c->check_range (this, sizeDeviceRecord)));
73 }
74
75 HBUINT8 pixelSize; /* Pixel size for following widths (as ppem). */
76 HBUINT8 maxWidth; /* Maximum width. */
77 UnsizedArrayOf<HBUINT8> widthsZ; /* Array of widths (numGlyphs is from the 'maxp' table). */
78 public:
79 DEFINE_SIZE_ARRAY (2, widthsZ);
80};
81
82
83struct hdmx
84{
85 static constexpr hb_tag_t tableTag = HB_OT_TAG_hdmx;
86
87 unsigned int get_size () const
88 { return min_size + numRecords * sizeDeviceRecord; }
89
90 const DeviceRecord& operator [] (unsigned int i) const
91 {
92 /* XXX Null(DeviceRecord) is NOT safe as it's num-glyphs lengthed.
93 * https://github.com/harfbuzz/harfbuzz/issues/1300 */
94 if (unlikely (i >= numRecords)) return Null (DeviceRecord);
95 return StructAtOffset<DeviceRecord> (P: &this->firstDeviceRecord, offset: i * sizeDeviceRecord);
96 }
97
98 template<typename Iterator,
99 hb_requires (hb_is_iterator (Iterator))>
100 bool serialize (hb_serialize_context_t *c, unsigned version, Iterator it)
101 {
102 TRACE_SERIALIZE (this);
103
104 if (unlikely (!c->extend_min ((*this)))) return_trace (false);
105
106 this->version = version;
107 this->numRecords = it.len ();
108 this->sizeDeviceRecord = DeviceRecord::get_size (count: it ? (*it).second.len () : 0);
109
110 for (const hb_item_type<Iterator>& _ : +it)
111 c->start_embed<DeviceRecord> ()->serialize (c, _.first, _.second);
112
113 return_trace (c->successful ());
114 }
115
116
117 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
118 {
119 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
120
121 hdmx *hdmx_prime = c->serializer->start_embed <hdmx> ();
122 if (unlikely (!hdmx_prime)) return_trace (false);
123
124 auto it =
125 + hb_range ((unsigned) numRecords)
126 | hb_map ([c, this] (unsigned _)
127 {
128 const DeviceRecord *device_record =
129 &StructAtOffset<DeviceRecord> (P: &firstDeviceRecord,
130 offset: _ * sizeDeviceRecord);
131 auto row =
132 + hb_range (c->plan->num_output_glyphs ())
133 | hb_map (c->plan->reverse_glyph_map)
134 | hb_map ([this, c, device_record] (hb_codepoint_t _)
135 {
136 if (c->plan->is_empty_glyph (gid: _))
137 return Null (HBUINT8);
138 return device_record->widthsZ.as_array (len: get_num_glyphs ()) [_];
139 })
140 ;
141 return hb_pair (a: (unsigned) device_record->pixelSize, b: +row);
142 })
143 ;
144
145 hdmx_prime->serialize (c: c->serializer, version, it);
146 return_trace (true);
147 }
148
149 unsigned get_num_glyphs () const
150 {
151 return sizeDeviceRecord - DeviceRecord::min_size;
152 }
153
154 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
155 {
156 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
157 return_trace (c->check_struct (this) &&
158 !hb_unsigned_mul_overflows (numRecords, sizeDeviceRecord) &&
159 min_size + numRecords * sizeDeviceRecord > numRecords * sizeDeviceRecord &&
160 sizeDeviceRecord >= DeviceRecord::min_size &&
161 c->check_range (this, get_size ()));
162 }
163
164 protected:
165 HBUINT16 version; /* Table version number (0) */
166 HBUINT16 numRecords; /* Number of device records. */
167 HBUINT32 sizeDeviceRecord;
168 /* Size of a device record, 32-bit aligned. */
169 DeviceRecord firstDeviceRecord;
170 /* Array of device records. */
171 public:
172 DEFINE_SIZE_MIN (8);
173};
174
175} /* namespace OT */
176
177
178#endif /* HB_OT_HDMX_TABLE_HH */
179
